topics.name: Addition
topics.description: Addition is the process of adding numbers together to get a sum.

topics.name: Subtraction
topics.description: Subtraction is the process of taking one number away from another. It is the opposite of addition.

topics.name: Multiplication
topics.description: Multiplication is a basic arithmetic operation that is used to find the product of two numbers.

topics.name: Division
topics.description: Division is the process of splitting a number into equal parts. It is the opposite of multiplication.

topics.name: Order of Operations
topics.description: The order of operations is a set of rules that dictate the order in which mathematical operations should be performed.

topics.name: Area of a Quadrilateral
topics.description: The area of a quadrilateral is the amount of space inside the shape.

topics.name: Area of a Triangle
topics.description: The area of a triangle is the amount of space inside the shape.

topics.name: Area of a Parallelogram
topics.description: The area of a parallelogram is the amount of space inside the shape.
